issue.title: [Rust] [Testing] Add IPC test files to arrow-testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5399](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5399). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're generating a lot of files for testing, which should ideally live in arrow-testing

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5399?focusedCommentId=16934268) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Could you elaborate on what the files contain?  There are already test files for 0.14.1 format in arrow-testing: <https://github.com/apache/arrow-testing/tree/master/data/arrow-ipc/integration/0.14.1> As well as fuzzing examples: <https://github.com/apache/arrow-testing/tree/master/data/arrow-ipc>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5399?focusedCommentId=16934900) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
I hadn't seen this yesterday [~emkornfield@gmail.com], my apologies.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5399?focusedCommentId=16951655) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Going to reuse the files used for integration tests
